tool.name: Octopus Variant Calling

param.name: log_level
param.option: Write verbose debug info to stderr
Write very verbose debug info to stderr

param.name: speed
param.help: Fast is equivalent to '-a off -l minimal -x 50'
param.option: Fast - Turn off some features to improve runtime, at the cost of decreased calling accuracy.
Very fast - The same as fast but also disables inactive flank scoring.

param.label: BAM/CRAM files to be analyzed
Input regions are given using one based indexing rather than zero
Region (chrom:begin-end) to be analyzed
File containing a list of regions to be analyzed
param.help: regions should be in format chrom:start-end with one region per line

param.label: Region (chrom:begin-end) to be skip
File containing a list of regions to skip
param.help: regions should be in format chrom:start-end with one region per line

param.label: Sample names to analyse
File of sample names to analyse
param.help: File should have one sample name per line. Must be a subset of the samples that appear in the read files.

param.label: Ignore any contigs that are not present in the read files?
PED file containing sample pedigree
The order contigs should be written in the output
Only report call sites
param.help: i.e. report sites without sample genotype information

param.label: VCF file specifying calls to regenotype, only sites in this file will appear in the final output
Output a legacy version of final callset in addition to the native version?
Output realigned BAM files?
Output split realigned BAM files?
Output a profile of polymorphisms and errors found in the data?
Enable candidate generation from raw read alignments (CIGAR strings)?
Enable candidate generation from adjusted read alignments (CIGAR strings) around tandem repeats?
Enable candidate generation using local re-assembly?
Variant file containing known variants
param.help: These variants will automatically become candidates

param.label: Only variants with quality above this value are considered for candidate generation
Extract variants from source VCF records that have been filtered?
Only bases with quality above this value are considered for candidate generation
Minimum number of reads that must support a variant if it is to be considered a candidate
param.help: By default octopus will automatically determine this value

param.label: Maximum candidate variant size to consider
Kmer sizes to use for local assembly

The gap size used to generate local assembly fallback kmers

The maximum number of bases allowed to overlap assembly regions

Minimum number of read observations to keep a kmer in the assembly graph before bubble extraction
Maximum number of bubbles to extract from the assembly graph
Minimum bubble score that will be extracted from the assembly graph
Maximum number of candidate haplotypes the caller may consider
param.help: If a region contains more candidate haplotypes that this then filtering is applied

param.label: Forces the haplotype generator to temporarily hold out some alleles if the numebr of haplotypes in a region exceeds this threshold
Regions with more haplotypes than this will be skipped
Maximum number of holdout attempts the haplotype generator can make before the region is skipped
Haplotypes with posterior probability less than this can be filtered before extension
Remove duplicate haplotypes using mutation prior model?
Protect the reference haplotype from filtering?
Which of the octopus callers to use
Organism ploidy

File containing a list of contig (contig=ploidy) or sample contig (sample:contig=ploidy) ploidies
param.help: file should have one ploidy value per line

Caller will report reference confidence calls for each position

Standard deviation of the germline SNP hetereozygosity used for the given samples
Germline indel heterozygosity for the given samples
Use a uniform prior model when calculating genotype posteriors
The maximum number of genotypes to evaluate
The maximum number of joint genotype vectors to consider when computing joint genotype posterior probabilities
Use independent genotype priors for joint calling
Disable additional calculation to adjust alignment score when there are inactive canidates in haplotype flanking regions?
Include the read mapping quality in the haplotype likelihood calculation?
The sequencer error model to use
Maximum number of seeds to use for Variational Bayes algorithms
Minumum phase score (PHRED scale) required to report sites as phased
Keep a copy of unfiltered calls?
